sentences.en: Analysts say News Corp's step to cede majority control in Xing Kong confirms this strategy.
sentences.cn: 分析师认为,新闻集团出让星空卫视控股权的举动,进一步证实了其退出中国的策略.

sentences.en: Not because I'm proud . In fact , in front of you I cede all my pride.
sentences.cn: 这不是因为骄傲, 你知道我在你面前毫无骄傲可言.

sentences.en: Not because I'm proud, in fact, in front of you, I cede all my pride.
sentences.cn: 这不是因为我的骄傲, 事实上, 在你面前, 我毫无骄傲可言.

sentences.en: Of course the attacks will stop if we cede those political objectives.
sentences.cn: 当然，如果我们放弃这些政治目标，攻击自然将会停止。

sentences.en: Only a short campaign took place in Puerto Rico, but after the war Spain ceded the island to America.
sentences.cn: 波多黎各岛仅经历了一场短暂的战斗，但大战后西班牙把该岛割让给了美国。

sentences.en: That is what the regime fears most, because then it either has to shoot its own people or cede power.
sentences.cn: 这是当前伊朗政权最害怕的，因为到那时只能被迫选择开枪射击自己的人们，或放弃权力。

sentences.en: The debater refused to cede the point to her opponent.
sentences.cn: 辩论者拒绝向她的对手放弃其主张.

sentences.en: The French army was defeated in the Franco - Prussian War and forced to cede Alsace to Prussia.
sentences.cn: 法军在法普战争中被打败,被迫把阿尔萨斯割让给普鲁士.

sentences.en: The General had promised to cede power by January.
sentences.cn: 将军允诺于一月份之前交出兵权。

sentences.en: They want slice off swathes of the West Bank and cede little or nothing in return.
sentences.cn: 他们要求无偿,或用极少的土地交换,得到西岸的狭长地带.

trans.tran_en: to give something such as an area of land or a right to a country or person, especially when you are forced to
